title: Customer Subscription Management System (Microservices-Based)
description: A production-ready subscription system built with Spring Boot microservices, React dashboards, and cloud-native deployment. Features role-based access, API Gateway, RabbitMQ events, and secure, scalable architecture.

title: Customer Feedback & Management Console (Java)
description: A multithreaded Java console app for collecting and analyzing structured customer feedback. Used JDBC for data persistence and automated exports in TXT, CSV, and JSON formats.

title: Artificial Ink - GAN for Handwritten Digit Generation
description: Implemented a GAN using TensorFlow and Keras to generate realistic handwritten digits. Trained on MNIST dataset with real-time visualizations and FID score evaluations.

title: Dynamic Note-Taking Web App with Node.js
description: Built a web app for user login, registration, and note-saving using Node.js, HTML, and CSS. Achieved a 90% satisfaction rate from academic review.
